overview: Dozing off on his girlfriend's couch, he had no idea her sister Nicole Black would wake him up, with no clothes on. Kristy Black is quite the tease. She waits until her top is off and he's worked up before asking for the cash she needs! Lady Dee is tired of waiting for him to make the first move, so she spreads her legs while wearing no panties. Leanna Lace has a thing for blue-collar guys, so she asks the handyman to show her his favorite tool.
title: Size Curious Brats 4
